location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a letter from Bruce Fawcett & Co., Agents for the Ceylon Government at Bombay, dated 9 November, regarding the recovery of six Arab mares, seized after the wreck of the Ahmed Shah.In enclosure, extract of a letter from Robert Brownrigg to Bruce Fawcett, dated Point de Gaulle, 10 October 1814, on the same subject.
